Make sure we don't ASSERT when the first layer is special and can't use the LayoutGeometryMap fast path - crbug.com/339141.

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS rects.length is 1
FAIL rects[0].hitTestRect.x should be -32. Was -47.
FAIL rects[0].hitTestRect.y should be 105. Was 158.
FAIL rects[0].hitTestRect.width should be 864. Was 1294.
FAIL rects[0].hitTestRect.height should be 21. Was 31.
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE

Foo
